title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil spaghetti according to package instructions.
Add chopped onion and garlic, cook until soft.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes.

title: Classic Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Add milk, egg, and melted butter, mix until smooth.
Heat a frying pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, flip and cook the other side.
Serve with syrup or toppings of choice.
